text: all Tokyo first held the Olympics
exactly fifty years ago in 1964 it was
really the re-emergence of Japan after
the defeat and humiliation of World War
two
why is Japan talking about the games
again well because in 2013 Tokyo won the
competition to host the 2020 Summer
Olympics rockier what will the new
stadium be like some have described it
as looking like a space ship a giant
bicycle helmet the stadium will also be
huge these enormous arches that will
support a retractable roof it's going to
have 80,000 seats the same as the London
Olympic Stadium but it will be twice as
big a lot of people think it's just too
high and then there's the cost and
finally Japan already has a lot of
stadiums so does it really need another
where is it going to end up as a white
elephant
